chest.name: Cobra Strikes
chest.desc: Your critical hits with Shot abilities cause your pet's next 2 special attacks to critically hit.

chest.name: Expose Weakness
chest.desc: Your ranged criticals increase your attack power by 40% of your current Agility for 7 sec.

chest.name: Lone Wolf
chest.desc: You deal 25% increased damage with all attacks while you do not have an active pet.

chest.name: Master Marksman
chest.desc: Increases your critical strike chance by 5%, and reduces the Mana cost of all your Shot abilities by 25%.

glove.name: Beast Mastery
glove.desc: Your pet's damage and health are increased by 30%, and it's Focus regeneration by 80%. In addition, your pet's [Growl](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=2649/growl) now also Taunts the target to attack it for 3 sec.

glove.name: Carve
glove.desc: A sweeping attack that strikes all enemies in front of you for 50% weapon damage.

glove.name: Chimera Shot
glove.desc: You deal 125% weapon damage, refreshing the current Sting on your target and triggering an effect:
bullets: [Serpent Sting](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=13550/serpent-sting) – Instantly deals 40% of the damage done by your Serpent Sting.
[Viper Sting](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=14280/viper-sting) – Instantly restores mana to you equal to 60% of the total amount drained by your Viper Sting.
[Scorpid Sting](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=3043/scorpid-sting) – Attempts to Disarm the target for 10 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once per 1 minute.

glove.name: Explosive Shot
glove.desc: You fire an explosive charge into the enemy target, dealing 81-98 Fire damage. The charge will blast the target every second for an additional 2 sec. Cooldown shared with [Arcane Shot](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=14285/arcane-shot).

leg.name: Flanking Strike
leg.desc: You and your pet deal simultaneous instant 100% melee damage. Afterward, your [Mongoose Bite](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=14271/mongoose-bite) and [Raptor Strike](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=14266/raptor-strike) deal 10% increased damage for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times. [Raptor Strike](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=14266/raptor-strike) has a 20% change to reset the cooldown on Flanking Strike.

leg.name: Kill Command
leg.desc: Give the command to kill, increasing your pet's damage done from special attacks by 60% for 30 sec. Each special attack done by the pet reduces the damage bonus by 20%.

leg.name: Serpent Spread
leg.desc: Targets hit by your [Multi-Shot](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=2643/multi-shot) are also afflicted by your [Serpent Sting](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=13550/serpent-sting) for 6 sec.

leg.name: Sniper Training
leg.desc: Your Shot abilities gain 30% increased critical strike chance while you have not moved for the last 6 sec.
